title: 455: Answering Questions + The New Podcast
itunes:title: 455: Answering Questions + The New Podcast
description:
Today The Broads answer some of the #broadsquad’s questions about Chatty Broads coming to a close, thoughts from Bekah on what’s to come for her, Jess and Evan’s upcoming podcast, and more! As more things continue to develop, Bekah and Jess will be making sure to keep the broad squad updated. Be sure to tune in Thursday for the recap of BIP episodes 2 and 3!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***WILDGRAIN: FREE Croissants in every box - and $30 of your first box at WILDGRAIN.COM/CHATTY 

***FAVOR: Go to HEYFAVOR.COM/CHATTY  to get your first birth control care package and Favor is offering a $10 donation to BEDSIDER.ORG for every Chatty Broads listener who becomes a patient

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM/CHATTY65 and use code CHATTY65 for 65% off plus free shipping! 

***ROTHY’S: Get $20 off your first purchase at  ROTHYS.COM/CHATTY 

***OSEA: Get 10% off your first order sitewide with promo code CHATTY10 at OSEAMALIBU.COM + get free samples with every order and orders over $50 get free shipping!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
